About SLNG

SLNG is an iOS app that helps you understand and translate slang into standard Indonesian and English. It highlights informal expressions and suggests clear alternatives, so your messages stay natural while being easy to understand.

Our Mission

To make communication clearer and more enjoyable.

Language is more than words

In Indonesia, language changes fast — new slang, abbreviations, and online expressions appear every day. SLNG helps you keep up with these trends by translating and explaining slang in real time, directly from your keyboard. Whether you're chatting with friends, scrolling through social media, or learning Indonesian culture, SLNG makes sure you understand not just what people say, but what they mean.

Born from Indonesia’s living language

Indonesia is one of the most linguistically diverse countries in the world. With hundreds of local languages and countless internet slang variations, communication here is full of creativity and personality. SLNG was created to capture that energy — helping people from all backgrounds understand and enjoy how Indonesians actually speak, both online and offline.

Built for real conversations

SLNG integrates directly into your keyboard, making it easy to look up meanings or translations without leaving your chat. It’s fast, intuitive, and designed to feel natural in your daily conversations.

Our Values

We believe that language is culture. SLNG celebrates how Indonesians express identity, humor, and connection through words. We’re committed to building technology that respects privacy, embraces diversity, and keeps human creativity at the center.

Privacy and Trust First

Your conversations belong to you. SLNG never sells, shares, or rents user data. We design our technology with transparency and privacy as core principles. For details, see our Privacy Policy.

Made in Indonesia, for the World

SLNG is proudly developed by a small team of Indonesian creators passionate about language, culture, and technology. Our mission is to help people everywhere understand the heart of Indonesian expressions — and maybe share a few of their own.

Join Our Journey

SLNG is growing, just like language itself. We’re here to make sure no slang, abbreviation, or trend ever leaves you behind. Start typing and discover how Indonesia speaks today.
